replies.body: Can the stacks be called ''Phreak stacks''? And then, when you finally get Feral Flare a small speech bubble appears above the item slot that says ''It's time to get Phreaky''?
You know, Feral Flare should just be renamed to Phreaky Phlare. Then I'll finally be able to play the junglers I've wanted to play: every single champion.
So god does exist ;-; thank you for replying finally after 2 weeks on the other post.
